00039 DataGeneratorIterator::DataGeneratorIterator(DataGenerator *generator)
00040   : m_generator(generator), m_keys_only(generator->m_keys_only),
00041     m_amount(0), m_last_data_size(0) {
00042   RowComponent *row_comp;
00043   Column *column;
00044 
00045   for (size_t i=0; i<generator->m_row_component_specs.size(); i++) {
00046     if (generator->m_row_component_specs[i].type == INTEGER)
00047       row_comp = new RowComponentInteger( generator->m_row_component_specs[i] );
00048     else if (generator->m_row_component_specs[i].type == TIMESTAMP)
00049       row_comp = new RowComponentTimestamp( generator->m_row_component_specs[i] );
00050     else
00051       HT_ASSERT(!"Unrecognized row component type");
00052     m_row_components.push_back(row_comp);
00053   }
00054 
00055   if (m_keys_only) {
00056     m_cell.value = (const uint8_t *)"";
00057     m_cell.value_len = 0;
00058   }
00059 
00060   for (size_t i=0; i<generator->m_column_specs.size(); i++) {
00061     column = new ColumnString( generator->m_column_specs[i], m_keys_only );
00062     m_columns.push_back(column);
00063   }
00064   m_next_column = m_columns.size() - 1;
00065 
00066   next();
00067 }
00068 
00069 
00070 void DataGeneratorIterator::next() {
00071   size_t compi = m_row_components.size();
00072 
00073   HT_ASSERT(compi > 0);
00074 
00075   if (m_columns.empty())
00076     m_next_column = 0;
00077   else
00078     m_next_column = (m_next_column + 1) % m_columns.size();
00079 
00080   if (m_next_column == 0) {
00081     do {
00082       compi--;
00083       if (m_row_components[compi]->next())
00084         break;
00085     } while (compi > 0);
00086 
00087     m_row = "";
00088 
00089     for (size_t i=0; i<m_row_components.size(); i++)
00090       m_row_components[i]->render(m_row);
00091   }
00092 
00093   m_cell.row_key = m_row.c_str();
00094 
00095   if (!m_columns.empty()) {
00096     m_columns[m_next_column]->next();
00097     m_cell.column_family = m_columns[m_next_column]->column_family.c_str();
00098     m_cell.column_qualifier = m_columns[m_next_column]->qualifier().c_str();
00099     if (!m_keys_only) {
00100       m_cell.value = (const uint8_t *)m_columns[m_next_column]->value().c_str();
00101       m_cell.value_len = m_columns[m_next_column]->value().length();
00102     }
00103     m_last_data_size = m_row.length() + strlen(m_cell.column_qualifier) + m_cell.value_len;
00104     m_amount += m_last_data_size;
00105   }
00106   else {
00107     m_last_data_size = m_row.length();
00108     m_amount += m_last_data_size;
00109   }
00110 }
00111 
00112 DataGeneratorIterator& DataGeneratorIterator::operator++() {
00113   next();
00114   return *this;
00115 }
00116 
00117 DataGeneratorIterator& DataGeneratorIterator::operator++(int n) {
00118   next();
00119   for (int i=1; i<n; i++)
00120     next();
00121   return *this;
00122 }

00126 DataGenerator::DataGenerator(PropertiesPtr &props, bool keys_only) : m_props(props), m_keys_only(keys_only) {
00127   int rowkey_order;
00128   String rowkey_distribution;
00129   unsigned int rowkey_seed;
00130   String str;
00131   std::map<String, int> column_map;
00132 
00133   if (has("DataGenerator.MaxBytes"))
00134     m_limit = get_i64("DataGenerator.MaxBytes");
00135   else
00136     m_limit = m_props->get_i64("DataGenerator.MaxBytes", std::numeric_limits<int64_t>::max());  
00137 
00138   if (has("DataGenerator.Seed"))
00139     m_seed = get_i32("DataGenerator.Seed");
00140   else
00141     m_seed = m_props->get_i32("DataGenerator.Seed", 1);
00142 
00143   rowkey_order = parse_order( m_props->get_str("rowkey.order", "ascending") );
00144   rowkey_distribution = m_props->get_str("rowkey.distribution", "uniform");
00145   rowkey_seed = m_props->get_i32("rowkey.seed", 1);
00146 
00147   std::vector<String> names;
00148   String name;
00149   m_props->get_names(names);
00150   long index = 0;
00151   char *ptr, *tptr;
00152 
00153   for (size_t i=0; i<names.size(); i++) {
00154     if (starts_with(names[i], "rowkey.component.")) {
00155       index = strtol(names[i].c_str()+17, &ptr, 0);
00156       if (index < 0 || index > 100)
00157         HT_THROW(Error::SYNTAX_ERROR, format("Bad format for key %s", names[i].c_str()));
00158       if (m_row_component_specs.size() <= (size_t)index)
00159         m_row_component_specs.resize(index+1);
00160       if (!strcmp(ptr, ".type")) {
00161         str = m_props->get_str(names[i]);
00162         if (!strcasecmp(str.c_str(), "integer"))
00163           m_row_component_specs[index].type = INTEGER;
00164         else if (!strcasecmp(str.c_str(), "timestamp"))
00165           m_row_component_specs[index].type = TIMESTAMP;
00166         else
00167           HT_THROW(Error::SYNTAX_ERROR, format("Invalid rowkey component type - %s", str.c_str()));
00168       }
00169       else if (!strcmp(ptr, ".format")) {
00170         m_row_component_specs[index].format = m_props->get_str(names[i]);
00171         boost::trim_if(m_row_component_specs[index].format, boost::is_any_of("'\""));
00172       }
00173       else if (!strcmp(ptr, ".min")) {
00174         m_row_component_specs[index].min = m_props->get_str(names[i]);
00175       }
00176       else if (!strcmp(ptr, ".max")) {
00177         m_row_component_specs[index].max = m_props->get_str(names[i]);
00178       }
00179       else if (ends_with(ptr, ".order")) {
00180         m_row_component_specs[index].order = parse_order( m_props->get_str(names[i]) );
00181       }
00182       else if (ends_with(ptr, ".distribution")) {
00183         m_row_component_specs[index].distribution = m_props->get_str(names[i]);
00184       }
00185       else if (ends_with(ptr, ".seed")) {
00186         str = m_props->get_str(names[i]);
00187         m_row_component_specs[index].seed = atoi(str.c_str());
00188       }
00189       else
00190         HT_THROW(Error::SYNTAX_ERROR, format("Invalid key - %s", names[i].c_str()));
00191 
00192     }
00193     else if (strstr(names[i].c_str(), ".qualifier.") || strstr(names[i].c_str(), ".value.")) {
00194       int columni;
00195       name = String("") + names[i];
00196       tptr = strchr((char *)name.c_str(), '.');
00197       *tptr++ = 0;
00198 
00199       std::map<String, int>::iterator iter = column_map.find((String)name.c_str());
00200       if (iter == column_map.end()) {
00201         columni = column_map.size();
00202         column_map[(String)name.c_str()] = columni;
00203         m_column_specs.push_back(ColumnSpec());
00204         m_column_specs[columni].column_family = name;
00205       }
00206       else
00207         columni = (*iter).second;
00208 
00209       str = m_props->get_str(names[i]);
00210 
00211       if (!strcmp(tptr, "qualifier.type")) {
00212         if (!strcasecmp(str.c_str(), "STRING"))
00213           m_column_specs[columni].qualifier.type = STRING;
00214         else
00215           HT_THROW(Error::SYNTAX_ERROR, format("Unsupported type (%s) for '%s'",
00216                                                str.c_str(), names[i].c_str()));
00217       }
00218       else if (!strcmp(tptr, "qualifier.size")) {
00219         m_column_specs[columni].qualifier.size = atoi(str.c_str());
00220       }
00221       else if (!strcmp(tptr, "qualifier.charset")) {
00222         m_column_specs[columni].qualifier.charset = str;
00223         boost::trim_if(m_column_specs[columni].qualifier.charset, boost::is_any_of("'\""));
00224       }
00225       else if (!strcmp(tptr, "value.size")) {
00226         m_column_specs[columni].size = atoi(str.c_str());
00227       }
00228       else if (!strcmp(tptr, "value.source")) {
00229         m_column_specs[columni].source = str;
00230       }
00231     }
00232   }
00233 
00234   if (!keys_only && m_column_specs.empty())
00235     HT_FATAL("No columns specified");
00236 
00237   for (size_t i=0; i<m_column_specs.size(); i++) {
00238     if (m_column_specs[i].qualifier.type != -1) {
00239       if (m_column_specs[i].qualifier.size == -1)
00240         HT_THROW(Error::SYNTAX_ERROR,
00241                  format("No qualifier size specified for column '%s'",
00242                         m_column_specs[i].column_family.c_str()));
00243       if (m_column_specs[i].qualifier.charset == "")
00244         HT_THROW(Error::SYNTAX_ERROR,
00245                  format("No qualifier charset specified for column '%s'",
00246                         m_column_specs[i].column_family.c_str()));
00247     }
00248     if (m_column_specs[i].size == -1)
00249       HT_THROW(Error::SYNTAX_ERROR,
00250                format("No value size specified for column '%s'",
00251                       m_column_specs[i].column_family.c_str()));
00252   }
00253 
00254   for (size_t i=0; i<m_row_component_specs.size(); i++) {
00255     if (m_row_component_specs[i].order == -1)
00256       m_row_component_specs[i].order = rowkey_order;
00257     if (m_row_component_specs[i].distribution == "")
00258       m_row_component_specs[i].distribution = rowkey_distribution;
00259     if (m_row_component_specs[i].seed == (unsigned)-1)
00260       m_row_component_specs[i].seed = rowkey_seed;
00261     if (m_row_component_specs[i].type == -1)
00262       HT_FATALF("Missing type for component %lu", (Lu)i);
00263     else if (m_row_component_specs[i].type == INTEGER &&
00264              m_row_component_specs[i].format != "") {
00265       if (!strstr(m_row_component_specs[i].format.c_str(), "lld"))
00266         HT_FATALF("Format sequence (%s) must contain 'lld'",
00267                   m_row_component_specs[i].format.c_str());
00268     }
00269   }
00270 }
00271 
00272 
00273 int DataGenerator::parse_order(const String &str) {
00274   if (!strcasecmp(str.c_str(), "ascending"))
00275     return ASCENDING;
00276   else if (!strcasecmp(str.c_str(), "random"))
00277     return RANDOM;
00278   else
00279     HT_THROW(Error::SYNTAX_ERROR, format("Unsupported order - %s", str.c_str()));
00280 }
